code: import axios from'axios';var GetInfoUserRequest=function GetInfoUserRequest(){return{type:'GET_INFO_USER_REQUEST'};};var GetInfoUserSuccess=function GetInfoUserSuccess(data){return{type:'GET_INFO_USER_SUCCESS',payload:data};};var GetInfoUserError=function GetInfoUserError(err){return{type:'GET_INFO_USER_ERROR',payload:err};};export var GetInfoUser=function GetInfoUser(userToken,id_chatroom,id_user){return function(dispatch){dispatch(GetInfoUserRequest());return axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"users/?id_user=").concat(id_user,"&id_chatroom=").concat(id_chatroom),{headers:{'user-token':userToken}}).then(function(res){dispatch(GetInfoUserSuccess(res.data.data));}).catch(function(err){dispatch(GetInfoUserError(err.message));});};};
